Mailing Address: c/o Kelowna Community ConcertsBox 22101Capri CentreKelowna, BC     V1Y 9N9
Alternate Contact: Brenda Karvonen, Membership Chairman; Phone: 250.768.1898; Email: bkarvonen@shaw.ca
Service Details: - Presents five concerts a year between September and May, is run entirely by volunteers, receives no outside funding, and does not solicit sponsors- Only members may attend concerts; no individual tickets are sold- Membership is affordable due to the dedicated group of volunteers who work hard to attract and present only the highest quality artists thus contributing to the rich cultural life of our community- The membership list is not sold or given to any other organizations
Cost: Membership:  Adults, $90; students age 17 and under, $25Please note:  there is a waiting list for those who would like to purchase a membership
